oshiSkill.name: 収集家
oshiSkill.description: [1/Turn]Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Reveal 1 support card from among them, add it to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

spOshiSkill.name: リベリオン
spOshiSkill.description: [1/Game]Deal 10 special damage for each support card in your archive to 1 of your opponent's back holomem other than Debut.

oshiSkill.name: Biboo Tax
oshiSkill.description: [1/Turn]Archive the top card of both players' cheer decks. For each color of cheer archived, draw 1 card.

spOshiSkill.name: 古代魔石の輝き
spOshiSkill.description: [1/Game]Deal 10 special damage for each [holomem with #Advent and cheer] in your archive to your opponent's center holomem.

name: Shiori Novella
collabEffect: パレ・モンローズのお話をお聞きになったことは？ : Deal 10 special damage to 1 of your opponent's back holomem.

skills.name: アデュー、親愛なる聞き手様
不穏な忠告
skills.description: This Arts may also target your opponent's back holomem.

skills.name: Just a Humble, Kind Witch
skills.description: If you have 4 or more support cards in your archive, send the top card of your cheer deck to your holomem with #Advent.

name: Shiori Novella
collabEffect: 『異世界への旅立ちと幸せ』: Send 1 cheer from your archive to your holomem with #Advent.

skills.name: 車窓から見える星がとてもきれいよ

name: Shiori Novella
bloomEffect: A Study in Advent : You may archive 1 support card from your hand:Reveal 1 [Debut holomem or 1st holomem] from your deck with #Advent, and add it to hand. Then, shuffle the deck.
extraEffect: If this holomem is downed, you get life-2

skills.name: 初歩的なことよ
skills.description: Deal 20 special damage to 1 of your opponent's holomem.

name: Shiori Novella
giftEffect: どんな知識が得られるかしら : [1/Turn]When this holomem downed your opponent's holomem, return 1 support card other than LIMITED from your archive to hand.

skills.name: 私達を見くびらないで貰える？
skills.description: Deal 10 special damage for each holomem with #Advent on your stage to 1 of your opponent's holomem other than Debut.

name: Koseki Bijou
collabEffect: 花売りの少女: If you went second and it is your first turn, draw 1 card for each cheer on both players' stage.

skills.name: 私……この頃よく夢を見るの。

name: Koseki Bijou
bloomEffect: 賑やかな家族 : Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Reveal 1 holomem with #Advent from among them, and add it to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

skills.name: とっても感謝してるの
Your Princess AWAKENS!
skills.description: You may archive 1 non-purple cheer from this holomem:Return 1 holomem from your archive to hand.

name: Koseki Bijou
bloomEffect: ビブーと遊んでいかない？ : Draw 1 card. You may archive 1 cheer from your stage. If you archived cheer, choose 1 holomem on your stage. During this turn, the chosen holomem gets Arts+40.

skills.name: キラキラぜーんぶ受け止めて！
skills.description: For each color of cheer in both players' archive, this Arts requires -1 colorless.

skills.name: 綾なす想いは、儚きブルー
skills.description: If your life is 3 or less, this Arts requires -2 colorless.

name: Mococo Abyssgard
collabEffect: ハッピー☆パピー -MOCOCO- : If all holomem on your stage have #Advent, you may return 1 Debut holomem from your back position to the bottom of your deck:Draw 2 cards.

name: Fuwawa Abyssgard
collabEffect: ハッピー☆パピー -FUWAWA- : If all holomem on your stage have #Advent, you may return 1 Debut holomem from your back position to the bottom of your deck:Send the top card of your cheer deck to your holomem.

name: The accomplices who achieved a jailbreak
ability: This card can only be used if all holomem on your stage have #Advent. Deal 20 special damage to your opponent's center holomem. Send 1 cheer from your archive to your holomem. You may only use the card <Escaped Criminal Gang> once per turn.

name: GEOW
ability: The holomem this mascot is attached to gets +20 HP. When this mascot is attached to your 1st or greater <Koseki Bijou> from hand, you may archive 1 cheer from your stage:Reveal 1 cheer from your cheer deck, and send it to your holomem. Then, shuffle the cheer deck. Only 1 mascot can be attached to each of your holomem.
